title: Driverless taxi that jumped red light... but did it actually do the correct thing and prevent a busy junction snarl-up?
description: Dashcam footage shows one of London's first driverless taxis running a red light as it drove the tech firm's boss to Buckingham Palace to receive a gong for services to artificial intelligence.
content:
Dashcam footage shows one of London’s first driverless taxis running a red light as it drove the tech firm’s boss to Buckingham Palace to receive a gong for services to artificial intelligence.

title: A chatbot entirely powered by humans, not artificial intelligence? This Chilean community shows why
description: Cloud computing giants Amazon, Google and Microsoft are among a number of companies that have built or planned data centers in the Santiago region.
content:
By MATT O’BRIEN
About 50 residents of a community outside Chile’s capital spent Saturday trying their best to power an entirely human-operated chatbot that could answer questions and make silly pictures on command, in a message to highlight the envir... [2719 chars]

title: Technology a vital instrument to ensure timely Justice: CJ
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Jan 31: Under the patronage of Justice Arun Palli, The Chief Justice, High Court of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh (Patron-in Chief, J&K Judicial Academy), guidance of Chairperson and Members of Governing Committee for J&K Judicial Academy, Jammu & Kashmir Judicial Academy today organised a One Day Orientation Programme on “ICT & e-Courts Induction Programme for the newly recruited Civil Judges” and “Artificial Intelligence and its Impact on Judiciary”. The programme was inaugurated by Justice Arun Palli, […]
